content: I have to agree with you there. I’m constantly being pulled this way and that. Twitter keeps on a’ buzzin. And social media, while it’s amazing, really digs into your reserves of attention! Then you get to procrastinating, and well, it’s a slow rolling descent into laying on the sofa eating a bag of doritos. It’s fun for a sec, of course, but digital noise can get way, too, I don’t know…noisy?
